variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-h11
dependencies.description: A pure-Python, bring-your-own-I/O implementation of HTTP/1.1

dependencies.name: py-httptools
dependencies.description: httptools is a Python binding for the nodejs HTTP parser.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-python-dotenv
dependencies.description:
Read key-value pairs from a .env file and set them as environment
variables

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: py-uvloop
dependencies.description: uvloop is a fast, drop-in replacement of the built-in asyncio event

dependencies.name: py-watchfiles
dependencies.description:
Simple, modern and high performance file watching and code reload in
python.

dependencies.name: py-websockets
dependencies.description:
websockets is a library for building WebSocket servers and clients in
Python with a focus on correctness and simplicity.

dependent_to.name: py-fastapi
dependent_to.description:
FastAPI framework, high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready
for production

dependent_to.name: py-gradio
dependent_to.description:
Python library for easily interacting with trained machine learning
models

dependent_to.name: py-lightning
dependent_to.description:
The Deep Learning framework to train, deploy, and ship AI products
Lightning fast.
